name: The Legend Of Rizz
description:
A short demo of an upcoming game im working on, The Legend Of Rizz (TLOR). All the game is right now is a menu screen and tutorial. Although this could change, at the moment TLOR is planed to be a goofy and stupid 3d combat platformer, aka nothing special.

Credits: 

Development: GooseGirl (lead dev of Real Goose)

Real Images: GooseGirl 

Level Textures: Screaming Brain Studios

Music: Kevin Macleod
